definition: (honorific) your kind efforts/thanks to your help
ancient cooking cauldron with two looped handles and three or four legs/pot (dialect)/to enter upon a period of (classical)/Kangxi radical 206/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
surname Li
We are most grateful for your valuable assistance.

sentences.english: NO04,5. I don't know how to thank you for all your help.
sentences.chinese: 你鼎力相助，我真不知該如何致謝纔好。

sentences.english: Red is te symbol of effulgence and brilliance, which also need your help.
sentences.chinese: 紅色是燦爛和輝煌的象徵，但這也需要您的鼎力相助。

sentences.english: In troubled times, though, they mean that the EU struggles to act.
sentences.chinese: 在困難時期，則意味着歐盟在鼎力相助。

sentences.english: Fortunately, Becky was blessed with strong family support.
sentences.chinese: 幸運的是，貝基擁有全家人鼎力支持的幸福。

sentences.english: We are extremely grateful to you for the trouble you have taken on our behalf.
sentences.chinese: 多蒙鼎力相助，不勝感謝。

sentences.english: Lent support when the glass rises and, this time.
sentences.chinese: 在酒杯端起之時鼎力相助，此刻。

sentences.english: We thank him for all his help.
But she does it with a lot of help from a nanny.
sentences.chinese: 不過，她是在保姆的鼎力相助下才辦到的。

sentences.english: We thanked them for all their help.
sentences.chinese: 我們感謝他們的鼎力相助。

sentences.english: On behalf of the Guangzhou Municipal government, I wish to express our heartfelt thanks to you for your gracious assistance.
sentences.chinese: 對於您地鼎力幫助，我謹代表市政府表現衷心地感謝。

sentences.english: At the highest level, to get our political leadership to make the effort that’s required to safeguard nature.
sentences.chinese: 捍衛自然的完整還必須得到政治領導階層的鼎力相助。

sentences.english: Special thanks to KLSCAH President Tan Yew Sing and colleagues in helping this.
sentences.chinese: 感謝隆雪華堂會長陳友信及同仁鼎力協助。

sentences.english: Please accept the gift in appreciation of all you've finiITd for us.
sentences.chinese: 請接受我的薄禮，讓我表達你對我的鼎力支持。

definition: to do one's utmost
(honorific) your inestimable assistance/thanks to your help
to join forces/to give full cooperation
to help one another/to come to sb's help
to unite in common effort
to cheer/to root for
to be of one mind/to work as one
lit. to stand like the three legs of a tripod/tripartite confrontation or balance of forces
We are most grateful for your valuable assistance.
a helping hand/help/assistance
hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
jointly/as a group/together
concerted efforts in a common cause (idiom); united and working together
to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts/to pull together/to work as one
lit. to join hands/to act together
